mapper.select: SELECT user_seq as userSeq, id, password, username, email, birthday, gender, phone_number as phoneNumber, status, role, credit, reg_date as regDate, session_id as sessionId FROM `user` WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT user_seq as userSeq, id, password, username, email, birthday, gender, phone_number as phoneNumber, status, role, credit, reg_date as regDate, session_id as sessionId FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, password, email, username, birthday, gender, phone_number, status, role, credit, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{username}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{status}, #{role}, #{credit}, #{regDate} )
